name: Beedo
Lore: 'Rodian bounty hunter. Relative of Greedo. Taking Greedo''s place in Jabba''s court. Fearful of Jabba''s wraith. Notorious sycophant.',
Text: '* Replaces any male Rodian for free (Rodian goes to the Used Pile) or deploys for 3 Force. While at Audience Chamber, all your Rodians are power +2, and whenever Greedo threatens a smuggler, may add 2 to destiny draw.',
